newsitem.title: USA: General Mills names senior executives.
newsitem.headline: General Mills names senior executives.

text.p: General Mills Inc said Monday it named a new corporate secretary and has appointed two new senior executives.
Ivy Bernhardson was appointed corporate secretary, effective immediately. She will also continue in her current position as associate general counsel.

Dan Strickland was named senior vice president, research and development, effective January 1. Strickland previously served as Johnson & Johnson's executive vice president, worldwide research & development, engineering and quality assurance, for the company's personal products sector.

Mark Addicks was promoted from vice president, marketing from director, for the company's Big G New Business Enterprises unit. Addicks played a key role in the development of several new Big G cereals.
